text: Yadi kono aghata tomadera pira diye thake tabe tara samana aghata pira diyeche dalake. Ara e'isaba dinagulo amara lokadera kache palakrame ene thaki yate allah abadharana karate parena tadera yara imana eneche, ara yate tomadera madhye theke saksi manonita karate parena. Ara allah an'yayakaridera bhalobasena na
